Environmental Rejuvenation: I would work with plants to restore damaged ecosystems, such as reforestation and soil regeneration, by asking them for guidance and advice on the best methods to use.
Plant Empathy: I would ask plants about their feelings and emotions, and try to understand their perspective on the world and our relationship with them.
Plant Celebration: I would organize a global celebration of plants, honoring their beauty, diversity, and importance to our planet.
